What you can expect from me: Website development based on client's custom design, with the requested client-side functions, considering the current UI and UX expectations. If needed, I also write scripts on server side (to a low complexity level). After completing the tasks, I manage the entire life cycle of the website from deploying to maintenance, through further improvements, finally to the later exchange of the website.

Unfortunately, you can not count on me with: Server side MVC systems, and JAVA language. If that you need, unfortunately I cannot help you - at least yet. I am open to new technologies, I would like to learn how to use MVC systems, or JAVA language.
